page.shortlink: grid component client side beforehtmlreportexport event
page.description: Fires when the user clicks a toolbar button to export an HTML report to PDF, Excel, Word, or text.
page.discussion: The *[js:beforeHTMLReportExport]* event is triggered when the user tries to create an HTML report using a toolbar button. This event can be used to put up a custom "working" message while the report is being crated. To dismiss the custom message, code can be added to the [afterAjaxCallbackComplete].

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: reportName
property.description: The name of the report to create.
